journey.title: About me
journey.first-job: First job as a Junior Frontend-Developer.
journey.apprenticeship: Apprenticeship as an "IT specialist for application development".
journey.swift: Bought an online course on Udemy about iOS Development with Swift, started to get involved in software development.
journey.wordpress-page: Developed first WordPress page for a small construction company hosted on Strato.
journey.web-development: Tried to learn Web Development. Hosted a example WordPress page on a "free webspace" service.
journey.source-sdk: Created "Counter-Strike" maps with Source SDK.
journey.scratch: Worked with Scratch in high school, a block-based visual programming language.

reelscore.content: European football livescore application, with an own developed extension "Performance-Form", derived from the shots, shots on goal and goals scored by a team. If, for example, only 3 shots were taken on the opponent's goal in the whole game and the game was only won 1-0, the performance was mediocre. In other live score applications, only the "result form" is displayed, derived from the outcome of the respective game. The data for this is loaded from the RapidAPI API-FOOTBALL, for this I have created an additional application to load new data and save it in my MongoDB database. Currently no new data is being loaded. To test the application, jump to the date 2024/05/18, there is content available.

angular-challenges.content: I came across this project through a blog post, introducing version 17 of Angular. Here I solved challenges myself, extended and adapted some of these challenges, made minor styling adjustments in the application and created my own challenges - Simple Animations & Enums vs Union Types.

ng-xmp-animations.content: Application with example implementations for Angular's integrated animations library

fachentwickler.content: Home-schooling platform for the vocational school, lesson summaries, quizzes, index cards & "matching" puzzle mini-game. Dashboard with progress indicator, display of the latest announcement from the school news archive, upcoming exams, timetable and lessons for the current school week.

cost-of-production.content: Build online platform with Vien-Angular-Admin-Template. For recording production costs in agriculture - farm statistics, questionnaires & reports.

vape-watchers.content: Greenfield project of an Ionic & React control panel app for e-cigarette users with information on ingredients and smoking behavior - nicotine consumption per day/week, used cartridges & usage history. User authentication via AWS-Amplify.

lernetics.content: Greenfield project of a cross-platform app with tab-based layout for a vocational school. „With Lernletics you can train yourself in various subject areas as part of your training.“

pio-office-suite.content: Greenfield project of a progressive web app with Ionic & Angular, a contact book with the possibility to initiate calls via direct dial numbers using an additional VoIP app “easybell”.

survey-app.content: Single-page application developed with Angular and Angular Material, application for conducting surveys.
